title: Institute Scholar Polly Fordyce receives NSF CAREER Award
long_description: Five Stanford faculty receive NSF CAREER Award
short_description: The grant supports early-career faculty who have the potential to serve as leaders in integrating education and research.

title: Deerfield and Stanford University Create the Porter Alliance for Innovative Medicines
long_description: Deerfield, Stanford University create Porter Alliance for Innovative Medicines
short_description: Deerfield Management, a health care investment firm, has committed up to $130 million to support innovative translational research at Stanford.

title: Second cohort of CZ Biohub Investigators includes ChEM-H Institute Scholars Polly Fordyce, Stanley Qi, and Michael Fischbach
long_description: Second cohort of CZ Biohub Investigators includes 33 Stanford faculty
short_description: The second cohort of CZ Biohub Investigators includes awardees from a broad range of disciplines, with fresh approaches to biological and medical problems.
